result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 08-02-22 at 9:30 a.m.  
Minutes.

1:42 pm - Prosecuting attorney Marconi De Franca Barros in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Tremain Darrell Morgan appeared by video, in custody, at Manitowoc County Jail.  Defendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.
Initial appearance scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.   Initial appearance is reset to 07-11-22 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Tremain Darrell Morgan
Current: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 06-30-2022)
Prior: 2440 45Th St, Milwaukee, WI 53210
RE:  Possess cocaine with intent to deliver-2nd or subsequent offense, on 06-27-22.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess Fentanyl with intent, possess cocaine with intent and possess schedule 2 narcotic with intent.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 07-05-22 at 2:30 p.m. Br. 1.  Bail is set at $10,000.00 cash with the condition that he maintain absolute sobriety.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
